text: Joseph A. Bracken, S.J., (born 22 March 1930) is an American philosopher and Catholic theologian. Bracken work is devoted to a synthesis of revealed religion and Christian trinitarian doctrines with a revised process theology. Bracken introduced a field theoretic approach to process metaphysics. ==References== ==Other websites== *Faculty webpage of Xavier University (Curriculum vitae as PDF ) Category:1930 births Category:Living people Category:American theologians Category:American Jesuits Category:Writers from Chicago
title: Joseph A. Bracken
